channel.title: Alpha on Experiences of a developer
channel.description: Recent content in Alpha on Experiences of a developer

item.title: RichFaces 4.5.0.Alpha3 Release Announcement
item.description: We have a feature complete release of RichFaces 4.5 available with the release of RichFaces 4.5.0.Alpha3. This is a full framework release with RichFaces 4.5.0.Alpha3, whereas previous 4.5 Alpha releases consisted of just the components. We’ve back-ported many of the improvements from RichFaces 5 Alphas into this release, while maintaining backward compatibility with the RichFaces 4.3 branch. To try out this release: You can download the distribution directly, or for maven users, increment the RichFaces version in your pom.
